name: U.S. business R&D performance, by type of cost: 2010, 2015, and 2020
description: U.S. business R&D performance, by type of cost: 2010, 2015, and 2020

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_2010
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of current dollars and percent

variableMeasured.name: field_2015
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of current dollars and percent

variableMeasured.name: field_2020
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of current dollars and percent

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Estimates for 2010 and 2015 do not include companies with fewer than 5 domestic employees. Estimates for 2020 do not include companies with fewer than 10 domestic employees. Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that performed R&D.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, Business Enterprise Research and Development Survey.
